title: Delicious Quiche
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 medium sweet potato, peeled and cubed', '2 teaspoons hot sauce (or 1 teaspoon chilli powder)', '1 tin whole kernel sweetcorn, drained', '4 eggs', '4 tablespoons cornflour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoons salt', 'ground pepper to taste']
